resources.string:
A one click access to your dish. Making everything convenient for you.
 Here are the top features of our all in one app-

 ☆ You can add channels, subtract channels, drop a pack, add new channel or create your own pack as you need.

 ☆ Recharge your set top box in one click and enjoy the world of dish without a stop.

 ☆ You can add reviews of anything you don't like about us. And trust us we will change it soon.

 ☆ Get exciting recharge offers.

 ☆ Get information of your last recharge,Next recharge date and more.

 ☆ No need to talk forr hours over the phone on the line and wait. Just submit your complaints. And our customer care executive will contact you soon

 And lots more..
